participants.name: Kenji Yamamoto
participants.description: Engineering Manager at Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories
participants.url: Former Software Engineer at General Dynamics Mission Systems

messages.message:
Brian
Hey how have you been? You always seemed like an engineering genius to me.
Haha, engineering genius is definitely a bit much, but thanks. I'm doing pretty well, how about you?

Brian
Awesome. Just got laid off from full time to part time and I have been looking to expand to places like Motorola or general dynamics, toy worked there right?
Yeah, I was at general dynamics for a couple years
